mapper.select: SELECT user_id, login_name, password, user_name AS username, email, role, user_type AS userType, dept_id AS deptId, del_flag FROM sys_user WHERE login_name = #{login_name} AND password = #{password} AND ISNULL(del_flag, 0) = 0

SELECT user_id, user_name AS username, email AS email, role, user_type AS userType FROM sys_user WHERE user_type != 99 AND ISNULL(del_flag, 0) = 0
AND user_name LIKE '%' + #{name} + '%'
AND email LIKE '%' + #{email} + '%'
AND role LIKE '%' + #{role} + '%'
ORDER BY RIGHT(user_name, CHARINDEX(' ', REVERSE(user_name) + ' ') - 1), user_name
SELECT user_id, login_name AS login_name, password, user_name AS username, email, role, user_type AS userType, del_flag FROM sys_user WHERE login_name = #{login_name} AND del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( login_name, password, user_name, email, role, user_type, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{login_name}, #{password}, #{username}, #{email}, #{role}, #{userType}, 0 )
